entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Prince Rupert
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 03:58 AM PST Wednesday 01 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -0.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Prince Rupert Airport 05:55 AM PST Wednesday 01 March 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -0.5°C
Pressure: 100.6 kPa
Visibility: 4.0 km
Humidity: 86 %
Wind Chill: -7
Dewpoint: -2.5°C
Wind: SE 30 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow or rain. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Snow changing to rain near noon. Snowfall amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 except 80 gusting to 100 over exposed coastal sections this afternoon. High plus 4. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Wednesday 01 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Rain. Temperature steady near plus 3.
entry.summary: Rain. Amount 10 to 20 mm. Wind southeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 except 80 gusting to 100 over exposed coastal sections early this evening. Wind becoming west 30 gusting to 50 this evening. Temperature steady near plus 3. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Wednesday 01 March 2023
